channel.title: Spring Q&A on Coding N Concepts

item.title: Top Spring Boot Interview Questions
item.description: Java developers are now switching from Spring Framework to Spring Boot for enterprise application development in microservice architecture. Spring Boot has become a trending topic to be asked in interviews from Java backend developers in 2025.

item.title: Top Spring Interview Questions
item.description: Spring Framework is widely used by Java developers for enterprise application development and most frequent topic to be asked in interviews from Java backend developers in 2025.
